notes: Spacious, well-maintained luxury apartment with modern finishes including central AC, polished floors, and quality built-in cabinetry. Large living room has excellent natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows with balcony. Multiple bedrooms visible, all clean with adequate space. The balcony railings appear to be horizontal bars which could be a climbing hazard for toddlers; otherwise the interior has rounded furniture and no obvious sharp corners.
